definition.procedurexml: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block type="event_trigger" deletable="false" x="55" y="84"><field name="trigger">On player tick update</field><next><block type="controls_if"><value name="IF0"><block type="math_binary_ops"><field name="OP">GTE</field><value name="A"><block type="variables_get_number"><field name="VAR">global:There</field></block></value><value name="B"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">3</field></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="variables_set_number"><field name="VAR">global:Points</field><value name="VAL"><block type="math_dual_ops"><field name="OP">ADD</field><value name="A"><block type="variables_get_number"><field name="VAR">global:Points</field></block></value><value name="B"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">1</field></block></value></block></value><next><block type="variables_set_number"><field name="VAR">global:There</field><value name="VAL"><block type="math_dual_ops"><field name="OP">MINUS</field><value name="A"><block type="variables_get_number"><field name="VAR">global:There</field></block></value><value name="B"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">3</field></block></value></block></value></block></next></block></statement></block></next></block><block type="text" x="164" y="187"><field name="TEXT">3</field></block><block type="variables_set_number" x="80" y="500"><field name="VAR">global:RC</field><value name="VAL"><block type="entity_get_scoreboard_score"><value name="score"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">RC</field></block></value></block></value><next><block type="variables_set_number"><field name="VAR">global:CCGXP</field><value name="VAL"><block type="entity_get_scoreboard_score"><value name="score"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">CCGXP</field></block></value></block></value></block></next></block></xml>
